languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт не выглядит удивленной. Слегка разочарованной — может быть.{/n} "Тогда что насчет моей просьбы, элантах? Так и позволишь своим собратьям докучать мне?"
{n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт не выглядит удивленной. Слегка разочарованной — может быть.{/n} "Тогда что насчет моей просьбы, элантах? Так и позволишь своим собратьям докучать мне?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet doesn't seem surprised, but perhaps a tad disappointed.{/n} "Then what about my plea, elantach? Will you just let your kinsmen to continue bothering me?"
{n}Yrliet doesn't seem surprised, but perhaps a tad disappointed.{/n} "Then what about my plea, elantach? Will you just let your kinsmen to continue bothering me?"
{n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"
{n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"
{n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特对你的回答并不感到惊讶，但似乎有些失望？{/n}“那么，外界人，我的问题呢？你会阻止你的族人继续骚扰我吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特对你的回答并不感到惊讶，但似乎有些失望？{/n}“那么，外界人，我的问题呢？你会阻止你的族人继续骚扰我吗？”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet no parece sorprendida. Quizá un tanto... ¿decepcionada?{/n} «¿Entonces qué hay de mi petición, elantach? ¿Permitirás que tus congéneres continúen incordiándome?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet no parece sorprendida. Quizá un tanto... ¿decepcionada?{/n} «¿Entonces qué hay de mi petición, elantach? ¿Permitirás que tus congéneres continúen incordiándome?».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ne semble pas surprise, mais vous décelez une pointe de déception dans son regard.{/n} « Et concernant ma requête, elantach ? Allez-vous demander à vos semblables de me laisser tranquille ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ne semble pas surprise, mais vous décelez une pointe de déception dans son regard.{/n} « Et concernant ma requête, elantach ? Allez-vous demander à vos semblables de me laisser tranquille ? »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wirkt nicht überrascht. Vielleicht ein wenig enttäuscht?{/n} "Was ist mit meiner Bitte, Elantach? Werdet Ihr den Euren gestatten, mich weiterhin zu belästigen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wirkt nicht überrascht. Vielleicht ein wenig enttäuscht?{/n} "Was ist mit meiner Bitte, Elantach? Werdet Ihr den Euren gestatten, mich weiterhin zu belästigen?"

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは驚いていないようだ。もしかすると、失望したのだろうか？{/n}「ならばエランタ、我の要求はどうなる？お前の同族が我を悩ませ続けることを許すつもりなのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは驚いていないようだ。もしかすると、失望したのだろうか？{/n}「ならばエランタ、我の要求はどうなる？お前の同族が我を悩ませ続けることを許すつもりなのか？」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, şaşırmış gibi gözükmüyor. Hatta biraz hayal kırıklığına uğramış gibi duruyor.{/n} "O zaman benim isteğime ne dersin elantach? Soyunun bana rahatsızlık vermeye devam etmesine izin verecek misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet does not seem surprised. Perhaps a tad disappointed?{/n} "Then what of my request, elantach? Will you allow your kin to continue bothering me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, şaşırmış gibi gözükmüyor. Hatta biraz hayal kırıklığına uğramış gibi duruyor.{/n} "O zaman benim isteğime ne dersin elantach? Soyunun bana rahatsızlık vermeye devam etmesine izin verecek misin?"
